title: List of all Android authentication  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android authentication  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: microsoft-authentication-library-for-android
repoList.description: Microsoft Authentication Library (MSAL) for Android

repoList.name: Android-Goldfinger
repoList.description: Android library to simplify Biometric authentication implementation.

repoList.name: fingerlock
repoList.description: Android fingerprint authentication library

repoList.name: azure-activedirectory-library-for-android
repoList.description: The ADAL SDK for Android gives you the ability to add support for Work Accounts to your application with just a few lines of additional code. This SDK gives your application the full functionality of Microsoft Azure AD, including industry standard protocol support for OAuth2, Web API integration with user level consent, and two factor authentication support.

repoList.name: microsoft-authentication-library-common-for-android
repoList.description: Common code used by both the Active Directory Authentication Library (ADAL) and the Microsoft Authentication Library (MSAL)

repoList.name: ParseFacebookUtils-Android
repoList.description: A utility library to authenticate ParseUsers with the Facebook SDK

repoList.name: AndroidOAuth
repoList.description: A simple way to authenticate with Google and Facebook using OAuth 2.0 in Android

repoList.name: ParseTwitterUtils-Android
repoList.description: A utility library to authenticate ParseUsers with Twitter

repoList.name: lock-screen
repoList.description: Simple and beautiful Lock Screen library to set an check pin code. Integrated with fingerprint authentication.

repoList.name: Lock.Android
repoList.description: Android Library to authenticate using Auth0 and with a Native Look & Feel
